footwork-all.js - All dependencies embedded, this can be used
                  without any other externally provided dependencies.

footwork-minimal.js - You will need to provide (via either <script>
                      includes, requirejs, browserify, etc):
    'lodash' - http://lodash.com/
    'knockout' - http://knockoutjs.com/

footwork-bare.js - You will need to provide (via either <script>
                   includes, requirejs, browserify, etc):
    'lodash' - http://lodash.com/
    'knockout' - http://knockoutjs.com/
    'postal' - https://github.com/postaljs/postal.js/

NOTE: All of these releases may be used via all common script loaders
      including requireJS (AMD) and Browserify (CommonJS). It is
      important that the names used for the modules match the ones given
      above so that the script loaders will work properly. For more
      information, see http://footworkjs.com
